data: If patient on methadone prior to admission, any prescriber can order the same methadone dose as prior to admission. Consider consult with site specific addiction service or provincial addiction Rapid Access to Consultative Expertise (RACE) line
Only providers who have satisfied their provincial college requirements can initiate or adjust methadone for opioid use disorder
Many drugs can affect serum levels of methadone and/or independently prolong QTC. If there are any questions, or to discuss any potential drug-drug interactions, contact pharmacy
